channel.title: Quickstarts on Farmer
channel.description: Recent content in Quickstarts on Farmer

item.title: Your First Template
item.description: Introduction In this exercise, you’ll: create a web application with a fully-configured Application Insights instance create an ARM deployment object and assign the web app to it generate an ARM template Creating a web app Create an F# console application using the .NET SDK: dotnet new console -lang F# -n FarmerSample Add a reference to the Farmer nuget package, modifying the FarmerSample.fsproj as follows and build the project to download the dependency.

item.title: Creating linked resources
